title: FlashFonts
content:
[Leslie Cabarga](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224932/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Leslie%20Cabarga)'s [FlashFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224932/http:/www.flashfonts.com/flashsite/fontspage.htm) offers more than 30 fonts, with styles ranging from classic to crazy.

The name FlashFonts might mislead one to think it refers to bitmap fonts designed specifically for screen use with [Macromedia Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224932/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Macromedia%20Flash). Cabarga's fonts are largely display fonts.

URL: [http://www.flashfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224932/http:/www.flashfonts.com/ "http://www.flashfonts.com")
author: mica
